sen.e: Ohara zakone is a custom that existed in Ohara region, which is sleeping together in a large number all mixed together in one room on the night of Setsubun (the traditional end of winter) in Efumijinja shrine in Ide, Oharamura village, Atago County, Kyoto Prefecture (present Oharanomuracho, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City).
